title: ‘Never, ever save your god-like father if …’: Rohini Acharya says ‘was cursed at’ for donating ‘dirty kidney’ to Lalu Prasad Yadav
text:
Day after “disowning” her family, RJD supremo Lalu Prasad Yadav’s daughter Rohini Acharya issued an emotional statement, saying she was “cursed at” and told that she donated a “dirty kidney” to her father who required a transplantation..

“Yesterday, I was cursed at and told that I am dirty, and that I got my father to have my dirty kidney transplanted into him, took crores of rupees, bought a ticket, and then got that dirty kidney put in…,” she wrote on X. “To all the daughters and sisters who are married, I will say that when there’s a son or brother in your maternal home, never, ever save your god-like father; instead, tell your brother, the son of that house, to get his own kidney or that of one of his Haryanvi friends transplanted…,” she added hinting at the feud spiralling within the Yadav family.
